article.title: Trade Leads - Asian Development Bank
article.summary: Visit this page for trade leads and featured Asian Development Bank procurement notices.
article.content:
​

Featured ADB Procurement Notices

• Bangladesh

Coastal Towns Environmental Infrastructure Project [CTEIP/GAL/RD/01]

Loan No.: L3133-BAN (SF)/L8284-BAN (SCF)/G0394-BAN (SCF)

Contract No. and Title: CTEIP/GAL/RD/01: Construction / Improvement of 5 roads; total length 6.555 km, under Galachipa Pourashava, Upazila Galachipa, District: Patuakhali.

Deadline for Submission of Bids:19 November 2014, 13:00 hours


• Kyrgyz

Emergency Assistance for Recovery and Reconstruction [ICB/G/01]

Grant No.: 0217-KGZ (SF)

Contract No. and Title: ICB/G/01 – 0217-KGZ: Equipment and Vehicles for Water Utilities in Jalal-Abad, Osh and Bazar-Korgon

Deadline for Submission of Bids:1 December 2014, 15.00 hrs (local time)


• Uzbekistan

Samarkand Solar Power Project [ICB/SSPP-45120/UZ]​

Loan No.: 3058-UZB

Contract No. and Title: ICB/SSPP-45120/UZ: Design, Build and Operate for 3 Years the 100 megawatt Grid-Connected Crystalline Photovoltaic Power Plant with Fixed Tilt Assembly in Samarkand

Deadline for Submission of Bids:19 December 2014, 10:00 a.m. (Tashkent local time)


For complete list of procurement notices, accessADB Business Opportunitiesor download theInternational Market Insights and Foreign Government Tenders.
